title: Tahm Kench
body:
Okay, so the past few games I've played that have had a tahm kench in it have all been complete trolls for the whole of the game.
They would eat/shoot you in to the enemy team/towers, building mobility boots with homeguard, wait for you to spawn and walk out of pool, eat you and then throw you back in.
Does anyone else agree that tahm kench seems to be a champion that encourages trolling with the way his abilities are set up?
Riot could at least give us a button to get out of his mouth if we want to.

replies.body:
Allies can get out of his mouth... Just right click somewhere.

And he doesn't promote trolling any more than champs like kalista or bard, if people want to troll, they will find a way.

His kit is based around a lot of communication the best bet is to try to get him banned if you don't enjoy playing with one. That being said if you don't enjoy one then will your enemy enjoy playing with one?
I've only seen one person do this yet.

You can exit him just by clicking like BarryButcher said, (So many people ask this, when its the most simple thing to test and the most obvious thing to do) 
also in regards to him being set up for trolling, i disagree, there will always be trolls, you're just associating them with tahm because all the trolls are trying him out atm cos he is new and has trolling potential (unless you just click the mouse to exit) 

so its not that all tahms are trolls atm, its that all trolls are playing tahm atm, there is a difference.
give them a while and they'll all go back to Zed supp etc

you can click out of his mouth (after a small delay)

just click next to him
